description: This is the main entry point for a Vue.js application written in TypeScript, responsible for initializing the app, setting up plugins like Pinia and Vue Router, and conditionally enabling mock API responses.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Initializes a new Vue application instance with the root component App.

methods.name: createPinia
methods.description: Creates a Pinia store for state management.

methods.name: enableMocks
methods.description: Enables mock API responses when the VITE_USE_MOCKS environment variable is set to true.
